column1: Baby Barnaby's////I am not sure what took me so long to write a review for this Montrose staple. As Julia Child said
column3: you could eat anything you wanted
column5: people were smoking cigarettes and all kinds of things
column6: and there was no talk about fat and anything like that
column7: and butter and cream were rife. Those were lovely days for gastronomy
column8: I must say." Barnaby's is not exactly what comes to mind when you think of gastronomy but they have done something amazing with their salads. I am not one to rant and rave about salads but their salads are mind-blowing amazing. Brunch is always a hit with friends. Make sure you get here early on the weekends if you don't want to wait.
